name: Administration of state low income housing projects and programs
text: (a)  The corporation may construct, develop, and administer property or housing for the purpose of state low income housing projects and programs. 	(b)  The corporation shall adopt necessary rules in accordance with chapter 91 including the establishment and collection of reasonable fees for administering the projects or programs and to carry out any state program under [subsection] (a). [L 1998, c 212, pt of §4]
